Key Match Events: Brandon Marsh cleared the bases with a three-run bomb for his 14th homer of the year
Trea Turner smashed a go-ahead two-run homer off Grant Holmes
Pre-Game Insights: The Phillies were coming off a 10-0 shutout loss to the Houston Astros the day before
Both starting pitchers exited with two outs in the sixth, setting up a battle of the bullpens
Reynaldo Lopez (7-4, 2.02 ERA) and Ranger Suarez (11-5, 2.82 ERA) are set to face off on Friday
Post-Match Reflections: The win improved Philadelphia's record to 79-55, six games ahead of second-place Atlanta in the NL East standings
Miscellaneous Highlights: With one swing of the bat, it was a brand-new ballgame
Former Phillie Whit Merrifield grounded out to end the game, capping an 0-for-5 night from the leadoff spot
